title: Mocha ricotta tiramisu
ingredients: ['8 savoiardi or boudoir biscuits (sponge fingers), about 65 g (2 1/4 oz) in total', '1 teaspoon continental roast coffee granules', '120ml (4 fl oz) boiling water', '2 tablespoons coffee liqueur or brandy', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '200g (7 oz) ricotta cheese', '200g (7 oz) 0% fat Greek-style yoghurt', '25g (1 oz) icing sugar, sifted', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract', '25g (1 oz) good dark chocolate (at least 70% cocoa solids), grated, to decorate']
